titles.title: Workforce Development Investment Act of 2013
To allow employers a credit against income tax as an incentive to partner with community colleges or other educational institutions to improve workforce development and job training for students.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/25/2013--Introduced. Workforce Development Investment Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a business-related tax credit of $2,000 for each community college or other institution of higher education engaged in a partnership with an employer to improve workforce development and job training for students. Allows a maximum credit of $10,000 in any taxable year.
